title: Competitive sudoku AI
description: Develop an competitive sudoku AI to compete in tournament with other players. It's build using game theory and has a reinforcement learning technique and (main) MINI-MAX game theory technique.

title: Bachelor end project
description: Made route scheduling software for Milk-Run routes, here when a new job is added to the system the software will check if the it's possible to add the an existing route or driver or it should reschedule it.

title: Weather CLI Tool
description: Command-line weather lookup utility built during a side project sprint.
